name: stock-visualizer
description: Interactive 3D candlestick chart with real-time strategy coding. Write trading strategies in a simple DSL, see buy/sell signals visualized on the chart. Supports 2D/3D views, SMA/EMA indicators, and timeline scrubbing.
author: Hermetic Labs

card.title: 3D Stock Visualizer
card.description: Interactive candlestick charts with real-time strategy coding

summary.overview: Interactive 3D candlestick chart with real-time strategy coding. Write trading strategies in a simple DSL, see buy/sell signals visualized, and switch between 2D/3D views with SMA/EMA indicators.
summary.exampleUseCase: Write a crossover strategy in the DSL editor, watch buy/sell signals appear on the chart, scrub the timeline to backtest, and rotate the 3D view to spot patterns.
summary.whatMakesThisDifferent: Strategy DSL is readable English, not code. 3D view reveals patterns invisible in 2D. Timeline scrubbing lets you backtest without leaving the visual interface.
